channel.title: Help with changing weapon speed
channel.description: i need help changing speed of a weapon!

item.title: Help with changing weapon speed
item.dc:creator: @Dayne Dayne
item.description:
@Dayne wrote:

Im using a PI base, can someone help me? I also need attack speed changes

Read full topic

item.title: Help with changing weapon speed
item.dc:creator: @sjustin1996 sjustin1996
item.description:
@sjustin1996 wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:3, topic:384487”][quote author=sjustin1996 link=topic=480253.msg3515762#msg3515762 date=1298968694]
Search through client.java for:

PkingDelay = 1; wepdelay = 1;

or however much the speed is, and then modify it. Most servers have the name quoted out near it for easy access.
[/quote]
LOL? No?

@OP: Stop posting this, I already answered your question; it’s in the “getBattleTimer()” method.[/quote]

That’s not in MY server files, but it may be in his. Either way, you may be right or wrong, it all depends on what base is being used.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with changing weapon speed
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“sjustin1996, post:2, topic:384487”]Search through client.java for:

PkingDelay = 1; wepdelay = 1;

or however much the speed is, and then modify it. Most servers have the name quoted out near it for easy access.[/quote]
LOL? No?

@OP: Stop posting this, I already answered your question; it’s in the “getBattleTimer()” method.
